Record.ClassificationPath: Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Metabolic Diseases/Iron Metabolism Disorders/Iron Overload/Hemosiderosis
Record.Description: Conditions in which there is a generalized increase in the iron stores of body tissues, particularly of liver and the MONONUCLEAR PHAGOCYTE SYSTEM, without demonstrable tissue damage. The name refers to the presence of stainable iron in the tissue in the form of hemosiderin.
